Title: Insufficient privileges or system components missing
Description: Setup failed with STATUS_INVALID_IMAGE_WIN32 or missing system components.
Remediation: Run the upgrade as an administrator, disable conflicting AV, and run DISM /RestoreHealth then SFC /SCANNOW. Verify system drive integrity and retry.

Title: Insufficient disk space
Description: Windows setup reported not enough free space to continue.
Remediation: Free disk space to at least 64 GB, empty recycle bin, remove temp files, and retry the upgrade.

Title: Access denied
Description: Permissions or policy prevented setup from continuing.
Remediation: Run as administrator, ensure UAC/policies/AV are not blocking setup, and verify access to C:\Temp\WindowsUpdate.

Title: Driver-related rollback
Description: Setup detected a driver crash or incompatible driver during upgrade.
Remediation: Update or remove problematic drivers (storage, network, display, AV). Check Panther/setupact.log for the failing driver and retry after remediation.

Title: Device does not meet prerequisites
Description: Hardware requirements were not met for Windows 11 (TPM, Secure Boot, CPU, RAM, disk, or WinRE disabled).
Remediation: Verify CPU, TPM 2.0, Secure Boot, RAM, disk space, and ensure Windows RE is enabled; remediate firmware or enable WinRE and retry.

Title: Unsupported processor
Description: The CPU does not meet Windows 11 requirements.
Remediation: Use supported hardware or approved policies that allow installation on unsupported CPUs, then retry.

Title: Application or driver compatibility block
Description: Setup blocked due to incompatible application or driver.
Remediation: Review CompatData XML/logs to identify the blocking app/driver, remove or update it, then rerun the upgrade.

Title: Cleanup pending from previous upgrade
Description: A previous upgrade requires cleanup of $WINDOWS.~BT before continuing.
Remediation: Delete $WINDOWS.~BT (and related temp setup folders) then rerun the upgrade; the script will attempt this automatically.

Title: Unspecified failure
Remediation: Review setup logs in C:\Temp\WindowsUpdate\SetupLogs and Panther for details; rerun after addressing the underlying issue.

Title: Unsupported installation choice
Description: Setup configuration is incompatible with the target system.
Remediation: Verify edition/architecture match, remove conflicting language packs, and ensure setup arguments are correct; retry.

Title: Timeout downloading updates
Description: Network timeout occurred while downloading updates.
Remediation: Check internet connectivity, proxy, and firewall; retry the upgrade.

Title: System shutdown in progress
Description: Windows reported a shutdown during the upgrade.
Remediation: Allow the device to reboot, then rerun the upgrade; self-repair will restage.

Title: ISO download transport unavailable
Description: BITS/web request could not fetch the Windows 11 ISO.
Remediation: Verify internet access, proxy/auth requirements, and BITS service health; rerun to resume download.

Title: ISO validation failed
Description: ISO health/hash checks failed after retries.
Remediation: Confirm the ISO URL and expected SHA256; rerun after updating configuration.

Title: ISO mount/staging failed
Description: setup.exe could not mount or stage from the ISO after retries.
Remediation: Check disk space, retry download, and review setup logs under C:\Temp\WindowsUpdate\SetupLogs.

Title: Application/driver compatibility block (0xC1900208)
Description: setup.exe reported an app or driver compatibility block.
Remediation: Review setup logs for the blocking app/driver, remediate, then rerun the upgrade.
